title: Pooms-E: Taekwondo Poomsae Judge Robot using Deep Learning
description: Pooms-E is a deep learning-powered robot designed to evaluate Taekwondo poomsae performances. This system automates the judging process, providing competitors with objective scores through a user-friendly web application. The robot is built around a Raspberry Pi main processing unit, which is enhanced with a Hailo AI accelerator to ensure smooth and efficient AI inference. A Camera Module 3 records the poomsae performances, while an ATmega328p microcontroller handles the arm movements. For the AI component, Pooms-E utilizes a YOLO object detection and pose estimation model to analyze the movements of the competitors. This model was trained and optimized for performance using the Degirum framework, which streamlines the post-processing steps. Despite limited computing resources, the system achieved a respectable 88% accuracy in its evaluations. The robot's scores are delivered to users via a web application built with Python Flask, allowing for easy connection and real-time viewing of results. This project successfully defended its thesis, demonstrating the potential of deep learning to bring a new level of precision to sports judging.

teamMembers.name: Francis Erick Datu
teamMembers.role: Project Leader | Web & AI Developer | System Architect

title: Ligaya Technology Solutions Portfolio
description: A fully responsive and professionally designed business website created for Ligaya Technology Solutions. This platform serves as a digital portfolio for the company, highlighting its services, team, and mission. The website includes an integrated appointment booking system that allows clients to easily schedule consultations. It features a clean user interface, intuitive navigation, and is optimized for both desktop and mobile devices. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the site emphasizes performance, accessibility, and modern web design standards. This project demonstrates expertise in front-end development, client interaction, and small business digital transformation.

title: Wiggies Bacolor POS
description: A point-of-sale (POS) system developed for Wiggies Bacolor, designed to streamline sales transactions, manage inventory, and generate real-time reports. Built using Python, this system enhances operational efficiency and provides an intuitive interface for daily business operations.

title: Walkie Talkie Speech to Text
description: A real-time speech-to-text system that converts walkie talkie audio into readable text using Raspberry Pi and PicoVoice. Ideal for emergency or field communication, it detects voice inputs through a USB sound card and displays transcriptions on an I2C LCD screen.

title: HEMOS: Enhancing Public Health with Real-time Monitoring
description: A health monitoring system designed to track real-time patient vitals using Arduino-based sensors and display the data on a Flutter mobile app. HEMOS aims to support public health by providing instant access to critical health parameters such as temperature, heart rate, and oxygen saturation.

title: Smart Parking Management System
description: A school project that uses Arduino with RFID, servo motors, and ultrasonic sensors to create an automated parking management system. The system detects vehicle presence, controls entry gates using servo motors, and authenticates access through RFID cards, providing an efficient and hands-on approach to learning embedded systems and automation.

title: Electronic Components POS
description: A school project that implements a Point of Sale (POS) system for an electronics store using Java and MySQL. The system manages product inventory, processes sales transactions, and stores customer and sales data in a database, providing a practical learning experience in software development and database management.

title: Sprinkle Bar
description: A school project that implements a Point of Sale (POS) system for an electronics store using Java and MySQL. The system manages product inventory, processes sales transactions, and stores customer and sales data in a database, providing a practical learning experience in software development and database management.
